text: 2019 iPhones will start at a lower price than the 2018 iPhones
full-pick-text: 2019 iPhones will start at a lower price than the 2018 iPhones

text: A new iMac has adjustability that is reminiscent of the Pro Display XDR
full-pick-text: A new iMac has adjustability that is reminiscent of the Pro Display XDR

text: A new iPad mini is introduced with a refreshed design, new colours previously not a part of the product, USB-C, Smart Connector, and 5G support
full-pick-text: A new iPad mini is introduced with a refreshed design, new colours previously not a part of the product, USB-C, Smart Connector, and 5G support
notes:
• Originally a Risky Pick.
  • This was very close to coming true, but it was missing a Smart Connector.

text: Apple will also announce a service bundle to get multiple services for one integrated fee
full-pick-text: Apple will also announce a service bundle to get multiple services for one integrated fee
notes:
• Ironically, this was deemed insufficiently risky to be a Risky Pick.
  • Federico was a year early on this pick, as Apple One was introduced in October 2020.

text: Apple will introduce a new iMac design with an accompanying external display
full-pick-text: Apple will introduce a new iMac design with an accompanying external display
notes: • The new iMac design wouldn't come out until 2021, and the new display came in 2022.

text: At least one of the Apple Silicon Macs has a Pro Motion display
full-pick-text: At least one of the Apple Silicon Macs has a Pro Motion display
notes:
• Was originally a Risky Pick.
  • ProMotion came to the Mac the next year with the MacBook Pro line.

text: Center Stage comes to the iPhone
full-pick-text: Center Stage comes to the iPhone
notes: • This was tossed out as a possible replacement Risky pick for this game after Stephen's original got invalidated, but ultimately landed as a Flexie.

text: iPadOS 15 brings organization changes to the home screen that don’t exist on the iPhone, including iOS 15
full-pick-text: iPadOS 15 brings organization changes to the home screen that don’t exist on the iPhone, including iOS 15
notes:
• "Widgets on home screen and App Library don't count as they are on the iPhone already"
  • This was originally a Risky Pick, but Myke couldn't get enough clarity for what it meant.

text: iPadOS is updated to include a more desktop-like mode with resizable and overlapping windows
full-pick-text: iPadOS is updated to include a more desktop-like mode with resizable and overlapping windows
notes: • Was originally a Risky pick with the addition of a "with keyboard and trackpad" clause, but some WebKit source code changes made it much less risky. He watered it down further by removing an "overlapping" clause as well and not phrasing it as a "desktop-like mode", but then decided to just go all the way back to the original pick.

text: Lightning is updated to be faster than USB 2.0
full-pick-text: Lightning is updated to be faster than USB 2.0
notes: • This was Stephen's original risky pick, but it turns out it's in the rumor mill.

text: New Apple Watch is a 'Series 8' Watch
full-pick-text: New Apple Watch is a 'Series 8' Watch
notes:
• "It may 'technically' be an Edition, but no new name (like Pro or Max)"
  • As mentioned in the Upgrade Draft earlier in the week, but not chosen there. This was deemed insufficiently Risky, and so was demoted to a Flexie.

text: No specific date for iOS 14's release
full-pick-text: No specific date for iOS 14's release
notes: • Originally a candidate for Myke's Risky Pick.

text: Podcasts will gain audio effects for enhanced sound and trim silence
full-pick-text: Podcasts will gain audio effects for enhanced sound and trim silence

text: The iPhone 14 Pro switches to titanium for the side rails
full-pick-text: The iPhone 14 Pro switches to titanium for the side rails
notes: • This was going to be a Risky pick, but rumors were found before the show.
